displayName.japanese: スポットライトの下で

description.english: Complete the "Solitude" play
description.german: Beende das Spektakel "Die Einsamkeit"
description.french: Terminer la pièce "Solitude"
description.schinese: 完成《孤独》戏剧
description.japanese: 「孤独」のプレイをクリア

displayName.japanese: いつでも簡単なわけではない

description.english: Listen to all the tracks in the "Solitude"
description.german: Höre dir alle Aufnahmen des Spektakels "Die Einsamkeit" an
description.french: Écouter tous les morceaux de la "Solitude"
description.schinese: 聆听《孤独》中的所有曲目
description.japanese: 「孤独」のトラックを全部聴く

displayName.english: Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy?
displayName.french: Est-ce la vraie vie ? Ou est-ce juste de la fiction ?
displayName.italian: È la vita reale questa? È solo fantasia?
displayName.spanish: ¿Esta es la vida real? ¿Es solo una fantasía?
displayName.schinese: 这就是现实的生活吗？ 这是幻想吗？
displayName.russian: Неужто это жизнь? Иль плод фантазии?
displayName.japanese: これは現実？それとも単なるファンタジー？
displayName.turkish: Bu gerçek hayat mı? Yoksa bir hayal mi sadece?
displayName.brazilian: Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy?

description.english: Return to the rearranged scene to make sure that it's not the same
description.german: Kehre zurück zur umgestalteten Bühne, um sicherzugehen, dass du dich irrst.
description.french: Retourner à la scène réorganisée pour vous assurer que ce n'est pas la même
description.italian: Torna alla scena riallestita per essere sicuro che non sia la stessa
description.koreana: 다시 정렬된 장면으로 돌아가 같은 것이 아닌지 확인하기
description.spanish: Vuelve a la escena reorganizada para asegurarte de que no es la misma
description.schinese: 返回重新排演的场景以使得它和之前不相同
description.russian: Вернитесь на переделанную сцену, чтобы убедиться, что она изменилась
description.japanese: 入れ替わったシーンに戻り、同じではないことを確認する
description.polish: Wróć się po rearanżacji sceny, żeby upewnić się, że ci się nie przewidziało
description.turkish: Aynı olmadığından emin olmak için yeniden hazırlanmış sahneye geri dön
description.brazilian: Volte para a cena reorganizada para se certificar de que não é a mesma

description.english: Complete the "Symmetry" play
description.german: Beende das Spektakel "Symmetrie"
description.french: Terminer la pièce "Symétrie"
description.schinese: 完成《对称》游戏
description.japanese: 「調和」のプレイをクリア

displayName.spanish: Sin embargo, los actores son importantes
displayName.schinese: 演员无论何时都是很重要的
displayName.russian: А актеры, тем не менее, важны

description.english: Listen to all the tracks in the "Symmetry"
description.german: Höre dir alle Aufnahmen des Spektakels "Symmetrie" an

description.schinese: 聆听《对称》中的所有曲目
description.japanese: 「調和」のトラックを全部聴く

displayName.french: Oups ... ce n'est pas ce que je voulais dire !
displayName.japanese: ああ...そんなつもりではなかったのに！

description.english: Push your companion into the abyss while having control over them.
description.german: Schmeiße deinen Kompanen in die Schlucht während du die Kontrolle über ihn übernimmst.
description.french: Pousser votre compagnon dans l'abîme tout en ayant le contrôle sur lui.
description.italian: Spingi il tuo compagno nell'abisso mentre hai il controllo su di lui.
description.spanish: Empuja a tu acompañante al abismo mientras mantienes el control sobre ellos.
description.schinese: 在控制同伴的同时将同伴推入深渊。
description.russian: Столкните своего товарища в бездну, пока управляете им
description.japanese: 仲間を支配しつつ、奈落の底へと突き落とす。
description.polish: Zrzuć swojego towarzysza w przepaść podczas przejmowania nam nim kontroli
description.turkish: Dostlarını kontrol ederken onları uçurumdan aşağı it.
description.brazilian: Empurre seu companheiro para o abismo enquanto tem controle sobre ele.

description.english: Complete the "Anger" play
description.german: Beende das Spektakel "Die Wut"
description.french: Terminer la pièce "Colère"
description.schinese: 完成《愤怒》游戏
description.japanese: 「怒り」のプレイをクリア

displayName.french: Ce n'est pas de ma faute

description.english: Listen to all the tracks in the "Anger"
description.german: Höre dir alle Aufnahmen des Spektakels "Die Wur" an
description.french: Écouter tous les morceaux de la "Colère"
description.schinese: 聆听《愤怒》中的所有曲目

displayName.koreana: 아무 것도 나를 막을 수 없어!
displayName.japanese: 誰も私を止められない！

description.english: Get to the princess before the anger takes control over you
description.german: Gelange zur Prinzessin bevor die Wut Überhand gewinnt.
description.french: Allez voir la princesse avant que la colère ne vous envahisse.
description.italian: Raggiungi la principessa prima che la rabbia prenda il sopravvento su di te
description.koreana: 분노가 당신을 지배하기 전에 공주에게 가기
description.spanish: Llega a la princesa antes de que la ira se apodere de ti.
description.schinese: 在愤怒控制你之前到达公主那里
description.russian: Доберитесь до принцессы до того, как вами овладеет гнев
description.japanese: 怒りに支配される前に王女に辿り着く
description.polish: Dotrzyj do ksieżniczki zanim złość weźmie nad tobą górę
description.turkish: Öfke seni ele geçirmeden önce prensese ulaş
description.brazilian: Vá até a princesa antes que a raiva tome o controle de você

displayName.german: Das Gute verliert für gewöhnlich mit den Ambitionen
displayName.french: La bonté perd généralement du terrain face à l'ambition
displayName.italian: Il bene di solito perde con l'ambizione
displayName.spanish: La bondad suele perder frente a la ambición
displayName.schinese: 善良的人通常会失去野心
displayName.japanese: 良心は野心に負けるもの
displayName.brazilian: A bondade geralmente perde para a ambição

description.english: Destroy all the statues in a cave
description.german: Zerstöre alle Statuen in der Höhle.
description.french: Détruire toutes les statues dans une grotte
description.italian: Distruggi tutte le statue nella grotta
description.spanish: Destruye todas las estatuas de la cueva
description.schinese: 摧毁洞穴中的所有雕像
description.japanese: 洞窟内の像を全部破壊する
description.brazilian: Destrua todas as estátuas em uma caverna

displayName.schinese: 我们遵循了我们的梦想
displayName.russian: Мы шли вслед за своей мечтой

displayName.schinese: 我们就像一个童话故事
displayName.japanese: まるでおとぎ話のようだった
displayName.brazilian: Éramos como em um conto de fadas
